song.title: This is Amazing Grace
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .G C
[1] .G Who breaks the power of sin and darkness .C Whose love is mighty and so much stronger .Em D C The King of Glory, the King above all kings || .G Who shakes the whole earth with holy thunder .C Who leaves us breathless in awe and wonder .Em D C The King of Glory, the King above all kings
[C] . G This is amazing grace . C This is unfailing love . Em That You would take my place . D That You would bear my cross || . G You would lay down Your life . C That I would be set free . Em Oh, Jesus, I sing for .D G C All that You've done for me
[B] .G(Em) Worthy is the Lamb who was slain .C Worthy is the King who conquered the grave ---
[2] .G Who brings our chaos back into order .C Who makes the orphan a son and daughter .Em D The King of Glory, the King above all kings || .G Who rules the nations with truth and justice .C Shines like the sun in all of its brilliance .Em D C The King of Glory, the King above all kings
[T] .G What other king leaves His throne .C What other king leaves His throne .Em What other king leaves His Glory . C His glory to die, His glory to die
song.author: Phil Wickham
